ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: But as for him who comes to you eagerly
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: As for him who comes to you striving (after goodness),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: But he who comes to you running,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: As for the one who comes to you earnestly (striving for guidance).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And for him who came to you striving,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: But as for him who came to you running,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And as to him who comes to you striving hard,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And he who comes to thee eagerly
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: But as for him who cometh unto thee with earnest purpose
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: but as for one who comes to you, eagerly
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And as for him who cometh Unto thee running,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: But as for someone who comes hurrying to you,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But as to him who came to thee striving earnestly,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: But as to him who came to you running.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And to him who came to you eagerly
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But as for him who came to you seeking.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But as for he who came to you striving [for knowledge]
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [80:8] But as for him who comes to you hurrying (yas‘ā is a circumstantial qualifier referring to the subject of [the   verb] jā’a, ‘comes’)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (But as for him who cometh unto thee with earnest purpose) hastening for goodness
